Hey! I'm Aaron and I want to intern for Storify.

I'm a journalist turned web developer who loves to tell stories with code.

Though I'm confident in my skills as a developer, I still have a lot to learn. As a result, I'd love to intern or contract you guys first and learn from a team that build a great product.

To show where I'm at, I built this lil' app that searches Storify with the Stories API, saves them and displays them to the right.

It ain't much, but it was a blast to build. If you're intereted, my details are below. Thanks!
